title: Soul of Fright
summaries: The Soul of Fright is a Hardmode crafting material dropped by Skeletron Prime.
Crafting all items requires 53 / 32 / 92 souls, meaning the player must defeat Skeletron Prime 2–3 times / 1–2 times / 3–5 times.
